result.arabic_text: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَخَذَهُمۡ عَذَابُ يَوۡمِ ٱلظُّلَّةِۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٍ
result.translation: Bahavuye rero barendegera mu guhakana bivuye inyuma Shu’ayibu, maze Imana Allah Ibahanisha ubushuhe bumena imbwa agahanga, baraheza bahungira nya bushuhe musi y’igicu kibaha agatutu n’akayaga. Bamaze kwiyegeraniriza hamwe bose musi ya nya gicu, ni ho Imana Allah Yaca Irungika umuriro ubaturira bose, mu vy’ukuri cari igihano c’ihonywa ku musi uhambaye.
